thread.title: Comfy and stylish getaway in Rome
thread.title_full: Comfy and stylish getaway in Rome - Review of Hotel Pulitzer Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Bettina Q
title: Comfy and stylish getaway in Rome
text: A lovely little hotel in a quiet area but very close to Metro B and quick to get to the centre. The staff could not be more helpful or friendly and they have a lovely cocker spaniel as a hotel dog. Incidentally they allow pets. I have stayed there a number of times for four to five day meetings and have enjoyed it on every occasion. The breakfast is well worth the extra â‚¬10.
